examples:
Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: i cancelled mys subscription but seems it was just on pause. i'm not planning on using this for 6 months (unless something changes). I also haven't used it since October. Can i get a refund?

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: 20.7.2020 I first paused my subscription to Canva pro and then canceled it. Now I have been charged again for the subscription for 2021 which I do not want and I canceled it on time. Please get your money back. Ljiljana Kukec

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have not use since November and I forgot to pause my account.  It’s been 3 months I believe (Dec., Jan., Feb.)since I’ve used my account.  I am now pausing my account for 3 months and would please like to get a refund for the months that I have not use it.  Please.  Thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: How can I pause subscription? I do not have time to work with Canva right now. I am wasting money.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I paused my account with the intention to cancel.  I did not end up using Canva like I expected.   I would like to request a refund for the last invoice amount.  I have cancelled the pro subscription completely.  

Thank you for your assistance.

Refund request reason: I am not ready to resume using Canva because of business reasons.  Can I continue to have my account on PAUSE for three more months?

NOTE - I'm not requesting a refund UNLESS Canva has invoiced me TODAY - Jan. 13, 2021.

Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, it seems that my fee was refunded and charged again when I requested a pause in my subscription? Can you guys check on that? Please reply to my email as soon as possible.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I would like to pause my subscription but it automatically charged me this month. I was not ready yet. Do I get a refund for this month? I am not getting option to pause

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi,

I was planning on cancelling the subscription as I know that I dont't think I will be using the account for a few months. I have now paused the subscription. Can I have the refund?

Thanks

<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I want to pause my subscription becasue I am not using it nearly as often and can't afford to keep paying for it

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was just charged for another month because I guess I paused my account (I don't remember).  I don't use the service though.  Would you be so kind as to give a refund?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I paused my Canva monthly subscription 11/2020 and would like to continue the pause in my subscription so I do not loose the work I did.  I am not ready to rejoin and use this subscription now.  I can not see a way to continue the paused subscription, my only visible options are cancel or resume.  Can you help me?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I need to pause my subscription and do not know where to do this on the website. I have not used the app for my business in 3 Months and plan to take a couple months off while I move with the army! Don’t want to lose my premium content though since I use it for my business branding! I need to save the extra $13 a month though just for right now.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi!
Could I please request for a refund for 15 January, I totally forgot about this subscription and have not been using Canva regularly now. I don't think i need premium until later in the future. I have paused my account for February and March.

However, could i also pause for this month (January) too, and get a refund on the payment that was automatically deducted. 

Really appreciate any help.
What kind of problem ?: Other Please describe your problem: Hi! I have paused my subscription until January 20th, but now I'd like to reactivate it. How can I do?
What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: Hello, can you cancel the last subscription? there was a payment and I would like to be reimbursed I temporarily pause my canva thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: How do I pause my Pro subscription? I only see the option to cancel. I'm currently paid through Feb 28. thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I paused my subscription to Pro - I think today is the first day.  If I unpause it, will my folders be back?  I forgot that folders were part of the pro version.  Don't have to have them right away, but it would be nice to get them back next month.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Am I able to pause my account? I haven’t been using it but would like to come back to it in a few months. If I cancel my subscription when I come back will all my designs etc be saved?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, I am trying to pause my subscription. When I go to manage my subscription my only option is to cancel. I have updated my Canva app and updated my payment information so I don’t know why I’m not give the option to pause. Can you please help me with this? I REALLY do not want to be charged again. If I have to cancel I guess I will but would prefer to pause. 

Thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I’ve been charged for a paused subscription

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there, I did not realized it was billing my card so soon. I havent use Canva in a few weeks - could I please cancel/pause my account and get a refund? thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: How can I extend my "pause" on a canva pro subscription?  The only options under billing and terms is to cancel, or reactivate.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I’d love to pause on Canva pro for the month of February. Taking a break from Instagram and my income is pretty sparse these days. But will happily un-pause for March. I love the program it’s really great!

What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: I have a problem with my subscription. When I open the app, the legend appears that my account is paused due to a payment that was not made. I have my app under subscription from Google Play Store and I already paid through the invoice of my telephone line and which appears that on February 8 will be the next charge
